member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.My.Resources.Resources.BLOSUM62
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to # Matrix made by matblas from blosum62.iij # * column uses minimum score # BLOSUM Clustered Scoring Matrix in 1/2 Bit Units # Blocks Database = /data/blocks_5.0/blocks.dat # Cluster Percentage: >= 62 # Entropy = 0.6979, Expected = -0.5209 A R N D C Q E G H I L K M F P S T W Y V B Z X * A 4 -1 -2 -2 0 -1 -1 0 -2 -1 -1 -1 -1 -2 -1 1 0 -3 -2 0 -2 -1 0 -4 R -1 5 0 -2 -3 1 0 -2 0 -3 -2 2 -1 -3 -2 -1 -1 -3 -2 -3 -1 0 -1 -4 N -2 0 6 1 -3 0 0 0 1 -3 -3 0 -2 [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.CoreDump.printDPMatrix``1(Microsoft.VisualBasic.DataMining.DynamicProgramming.SmithWaterman.GSW{``0},System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: print the dynmaic programming matrix

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.CoreDump.printAlignments``1(Microsoft.VisualBasic.DataMining.DynamicProgramming.SmithWaterman.GSW{``0},System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Output the local alignments with the maximum score.
member.remarks: Note: empty alignments are not printed.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.CoreDump.printAlignments``1(Microsoft.VisualBasic.DataMining.DynamicProgramming.SmithWaterman.GSW{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Output the local alignments ending in the (i, j) cell. aligned1 and aligned2 are suffixes of final aligned strings found in backtracking before calling this function. Note: the strings are replicated at each recursive call. Use buffers or stacks to improve efficiency.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.Output.Directions
member.summary: The directions pointing to the cells that give the maximum score at the current cell. The first index is the column index. The second index is the row index.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.Blosum.FromInnerBlosum62
member.summary:
Default Blosum-62 substitution matrix from inner resource
Looks up a localized string similar to # Matrix made by matblas from blosum62.iij # * column uses minimum score # BLOSUM Clustered Scoring Matrix in 1/2 Bit Units # Blocks Database = /data/blocks_5.0/blocks.dat # Cluster Percentage: >= 62 # Entropy = 0.6979, Expected = -0.5209 A R N D C Q E G H I L K M F P S T W Y V B Z X * A 4 -1 -2 -2 0 -1 -1 0 -2 -1 -1 -1 -1 -2 -1 1 0 -3 -2 0 -2 -1 0 -4 R -1 5 0 -2 -3 1 0 -2 0 -3 -2 2 -1 -3 -2 -1 -1 -3 -2 -3 -1 0 -1 -4 N -2 0 6 1 -3 0 0 0 1 -3 -3 0 -2 [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SmithWaterman
member.summary:
Smith-Waterman local alignment algorithm.
Design Note: this class implements AminoAcids interface: a simple fix customized to amino acids, since that is all we deal with in this class Supporting both DNA and Aminoacids, will require a more general design.

member.name: F:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SmithWaterman.blosum62
member.summary: 蛋白比对的矩阵

member.param: If the matrix parameter is null, then the default build in blosum62 matrix will be used.

member.summary: Default using ``Blosum62`` matrix.
